Interface iCards

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LevelTwoCards, TestFlightCards
public interface iCards extends Serializable
Represents a pile of iCard that can be pulled.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Integer>
    getConstructionCards()
    Get a list of IDs of the cards displayed during the construction phase.

    getLeft()

    pullCard()
    Pull a iCard from the top of the pile.

  • Method Details

    • pullCard

      iCard pullCard()
      Pull a iCard from the top of the pile.
      Returns:
      iCard The card at the top, or null if the pile is exhausted.

    • getConstructionCards

      List<Integer> getConstructionCards()
      Get a list of IDs of the cards displayed during the construction phase.
      Returns:
      An array of IDs of every card visible during the construction phase.

      int getLeft()
